meanings.sent1: The curtailer of our fun was the early curfew.
meanings.sent2: The teacher, as the curtailer of recess, ended the game early.
meanings.sent3: The curtailer of dessert was the lack of ingredients in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The rainy weather acted as a curtailer on our outdoor plans.
meanings.sent5: The curtailer of the movie night was the sudden power outage.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that cuts short or reduces something.
meanings.sent1: The budget cuts acted as a curtailer on the project's progress.
meanings.sent2: The curtailer of her happiness was the constant criticism.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected phone call served as a curtailer to their conversation.
meanings.sent4: The curtailer of his dreams was the lack of support from his family.
meanings.sent5: The curtailer of the celebration was the arrival of bad news.
